info.brief_description: Summer vacation is here and Phillip finds a stone that will change his life forever.
info.description:
After a long year of rigorous study and school life, the summer is finally here. It's hot and plain boring until Phillip Martens finds a stone that allows him to possess somebody and live their life through their eyes. Through the writers and readers, they can guide Phillip to become altruistic with his powers or become malevolent in it.

         The place takes place in San Valentino, California. The city happens to have a Mediterranean Climates that makes its winters mild and summers long and dry. The place is one of the original settlements of the Native Americans which was soon followed by the Spanish Inquisitors.

Characters:

Martens Family: A big family but with both parents working, they seem to go along so well.

Phillip Martens: Main Character of the story. People considers him to be anti-social but in reality, he prefers closer friends than a large group of one. For appearances, he keeps his hair black and short and his face has the sign of receding pimples. He does not take exercises which left his body slightly pudgy but not overweight. Also, he considers himself bisexual. Age 16.
Andrew Martens: Father of the family and a large caring bear. Standing 6 foot and 3 inches, he's always mistaken to be a gruff of a man. In reality, he has a kind heart due to his immigration history. He knew how hard life was back in his home country so he does his job eagerly to keep his family away from poverty. He has a Filipino ancestry from her mother's side. Age 48.
Lyanna Martens: Not entirely MILF material but she works on the gym every other day to keep hos body firm and healthy. While she does have a job at the local farmer store, she still has time to take care of her family. At her age, she makes sure of her children's welfare and social status. With the declining of Phillip's grades, she starting to worry what's wrong. Age 44.
Andrew "Kyle" Martens Jr.: Commonly known as Kyle. As the eldest brother, he takes responsibility whenever his parents are not around, which is common. Since he was young, he learned how to become responsible and independent in the household work. Despite his strict attitude, he never fails to have fun with his twin and younger siblings. Age 19.
Lyra "Kristine" Martens: Only coming out mere seconds before her twin, she became the second eldest in the family. She shares the responsible attitude of her twin but never the independence. She always looks up to others for help, even in the simplest of things. She also has a short temper and her anger lasts as much. Give her some food and she'll cool down for people to talk to. Age 19.
Eugene "Gene" Martens: Always called as "Gene" by his siblings and "Eugene by his friends. Trying new and dangerous things is this guy's forte but going away with it, not so much. At age 5, he was fond of the garage and the tools around. At age 7, he created his first explosive with only a handful of paper clips, an old car battery and the neighbor's kitten (Mr. Whisker's survived but left her tail smoking). At age 12, he nearly burned the garage down with his homemade flaming potato launcher. His family thinks he has the potential to be a great engineer and he thinks the same too. But his reckless attitude does not permit him that. A demolition Expert is a thought at the back of his mind. Age 12.
Olivia Martens: A short yet terrible kid. She's smart and cunning but in the bad way. She knows how to deceive and how to fool people and the ways how to get away with it. Age 10.

Major Characters:
Close Friends
Mark Phillip Damien : Phillip originally though Mark as rival due to a misspoken rumor. Als0 to the fact that his second name is the same with his first. But as time went on, they talked and found many similarities between the two of them. From their taste in music to their love of geek culture, Phillip considers Mark his long lost brother from another mother. They mostly hangout at the abandoned Spanish bunker near the mountain side. He is planning to take indoor design in college. Age 18.
Grace Ryder: As a young kid, Phillip never really had a liking for girls, mostly due to her drama filled sister. But during his 3rd grade, his views about girls changed for the better. Grace became the adviser of Phillip when he has problems. So far, her mostly helps the situation Phillip were in. She is planning to take psychology as a course in college. Age 18.
Ian Vance Jr.: Male and gay. So far, he is closeted and only Phillip, Mark and Grace knows his sexuality. He is found to be quite an order maniac and strives to keep everything in its perfect state. His talents include; proficiency in painting and dancing, knows the many rumors of the town and the secret keeper of many. He is on his way to achieve a degree on arts and gender studies. Age 19.

Friends
Boys
James Keller:Phillip's classmate last year and considered the best leader around. He would kindly give everyone orders and everyone would do so. He is a nice guy to be friend with and you'll be crossing heads when you get on his nerves. He is the son of Marcus Keller, the running Mayor of the town. Age 17.
Terry Halley: School rich kid and a snotty brat. The Haley is behind the Keller campaign so he expects to be on the good side of James Keller. James on the other hand was none too happy with his monetary relations with Terry. Terry is short in stature and a bright blond hair. Age 18.
Justy Hopkins: The school top hunk and the football Captain of the Saint Bernards. He is known in the school as "Skipper Hopper" because Skipper is also the other term for football captain. Unlike other jocks, he does not undermine the people below him. People has seen him to be kind and understanding and always acts as the mediator of fights. He is always with Matthew Williams. Age 18.
Matthew Williams: Valedictorian and has been on the Principal's honor rolls for 12 consecutive years. He come out to be this weird kid that everyone avoids. But with the help of a close friend, he became social with others and began to partake in clubs and parties. Up to this, some people still hold a prejudice against him. Age 17.
Ricky Damien: Brother of Mark Damien. A young and energetic lad. All of that changed when he got into a car crash. Now, he lies weak and pale in the San Valentino Hospital. Everyone is hopeful that he will break out of his coma anytime soon. Age 12.

Girls
Melinda David: The school cheerleading captain and a widely known drama queen. She has the habit of mingling with the jocks, having relationships with them for weeks and suddenly breaking up with them. Rumors spread and people learned. She spent days mocking her previous exes on social media. Soon, she preyed on the new jocks which are gullible to her charms. Age 17.
Adeline Georgeson: A cahoot of Melinda but shares an opposite attitude than her. She has a stable relationship with James Keller for 3 years and going strong for the following. She is beautiful and sexy for teen standards and that is why several adult personnel has their eyebrows unkempt within her. While she still has the bitchy attitude, she has rare moments of logical actions which benefits her and the people around her. Age 17.
Clara Pond: A school hottie and a member of the school cheer leading squad. While she has the sassy attitude of an urban teenage girl, she still has morals to keep her ground. Although, she may do reckless actions to keep her popularity in a stable state.
Gena Mathers: The female body and wits. While she is not overly sexy, she still manages to keep appearances. From 1st year to the last year of junior high, she was always the candidate for debate competitions. She may have a stern attitude but deep inside, she likes ponies.


Relatives
Father's Side
Oliver Martens (Cousin): Living only next door, this guy is a know it all about the history of the town. Actually, he is working at the museum of San Valentino and he is striving to be the youngest curator in centuries. His attitude is a chill guy and is known to be stashing weed somewhere. Age 24.
Quinzel Martens (Cousin): Oliver's younger sister. Still in her pre-teens. She is bound to be playing beside Olivia when her time is free. Has a short temper and cries a lot. Age 9.
Phineas Martens (Uncle) Age 45
Matilda Martens (Aunt) Age 49

Mother's Side
Owens Family: Has a tradition of always coming to San Valentino over the summer. Mainly to have a trek on the mountains or use the Martens' Household as a pit stop to California. They live in Oregon.
Joseph Owens (Uncle): A hulk of a man and is considered by many as an adrenaline junkie. Always takes advantage of the scenery to induce shock to himself and to unsuspecting individuals. Age 38.
Maria Owens (Aunt): She met Joseph on her trip to Moscow, Russia. Joseph dropped his bear pelt and Maria managed to bring it to him in time. Like Joseph, she is also considered an adrenaline junkie and always partakes in thrilling trips around the world. Age 30.
Larry Owens (Cousin): The unlikely result of the parents. He is sickly, easily spooked and always stuttering. When he does visit the Martens' household, he is always sure to avoid Gene at all time. Amidst the fear, he is a nice kid and always like to read in his spare time. Age 14.

Events
*Half a month ago, the federal government established an outpost just 20 kilometers away from the city entrance. The skies above it is strictly a no fly zone.
*One month and the pop election for Mayoral seat will happen. Marcus Keller V.S Haley Jones.
*Next week would mark the cultural festival. A time in which the sun would hit the mountains just right and make the Lakeside Waterfall glow golden.
*One day after the cultural festival is the entrance festival. It is dedicated for people who are going to go back to school in the next school year. There will be bands, concerts and foods. Most students, even the anti-social ones go to the festival.
*10 more weeks before classes start again.

The Power
*The powers of the stone only include possession and intangibility.
*The user can only be intangible when near a vessel.
*That means, no invisibility, flight, memory changing and animal possession. There are other stones for those powers.
*Only the guardian of the stone can share the powers (which is Phillip Martens) and he has the power to revoke the said power.

Writing Notes
-Consider writing 2 or more paragraphs in the story.
-Always use 3rd person in the story. It widens the writing view of the story, making it not always about the main character. You can loosely use 3rd person limited omniscience, meaning, one character Point of View per paragraph.
-The spell check is there for a reason. Don't be shy on using them. Still, there might be words that can pass the spell check. Be your own Beta Reader.
-I as the creator can also make mistakes. Message me if you found one. Rewards await to the finder.

Story Notes
-While I classified the story as Erotica, please don't take it for granted. Plot of the story should outweigh the sexual side stories.
-Please consider equality of genders in the chapter decisions. This is the present, please be considerate about our brothers and sisters with differing genders.
-Don't forget to tell the feelings of other characters.
-Be imaginative but not too flowery with words.
-When creating new characters or locations, be good at describing them. And don't be too cliche. Making a cheerleader character whose only purpose was too act sexy all the time is boring. Take Clara Pond for example, while she is beautiful, she suffers from anxiety in losing her popularity.

A/N: I accept Interactive Story transfers. Also, I can write chapters in other interactive stories as long as I have the idea and time.

Disclosure
Any specific names, locations or establishments said on the story are not my property and never will be. If such names are said in the story, it is purely coincidental and has no intention to infringe the rights of the owner.
